title: 103_s717
content: Egg Research and Consumer Information Act Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Egg Research and Consumer Information Act to: (1) increase the maximum assessment rate from ten cents per case of commercial eggs to 20 cents per case. (2) authorize the Egg Board to increase assessments subject to producer referendum. (3) increase the trigger level for assessment exemptions from 30,000 laying hens to 75,000 laying hens, and (4) allocate funds for research activities.
